roleset.name: curious
roleset.note: CURIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, unhappy-j.01, intrigue-v.01, which corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1. (from curious.01-j)

example.name: all args, non-finite clause arg2
example.text: He is curious to know why you came.

roleset.name: strange; 'curiouser and curiouser'
roleset.note: CURIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on FrameNet, WordNet. (from curious.02-j)

role.descr: thing that is strange (may require concatenation

example.name: empty it with possible concatenation (depending on tree)
example.text: They didn't, because if that was an integral part of France, it was curious of them to leave all those non-French residing on it.
example.arg: if that was an integral part of France
[of them],[to leave all those non-French residing on it]
